item.title: Akeneo expression language functions
item.description: FEATURE STATE: Middleware 0.1 [alpha] Goal This library implements functions for manipulating Akeneo API data through the Symfony Expression Language. Installation composer require php-etl/akeneo-expression-language Usage YAML PHP - fastmap: map: - field: '[title]' expression: 'filter(input["title"], scope("print", "mobile", "web"), first())' <?php use Symfony\Component\ExpressionLanguage\ExpressionLanguage; use Kiboko\Component\ExpressionLanguage\Akeneo\AkeneoFilterProvider; $input = [ [ 'locale' => 'en_US', 'scope' => 'mobile', 'data' => 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet', ], [ 'locale' => 'fr_CA', 'scope' => 'web', 'data' => 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet', ], [ 'locale' => 'fr_CA', 'scope' => 'marketplace', 'data' => 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet', ], [ 'locale' => 'fr_FR', 'scope' => 'print', 'data' => 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet', ], [ 'locale' => 'en_GB', 'scope' => 'mobile', 'data' => 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet', ], ]; $expression = 'filter(input, scope("print", "mobile", "web"), first())'; $interpreter = new ExpressionLanguage(null, [new AkeneoFilterProvider()]); $interpreter->evaluate($expression, ['input' => $input]);

item.title: Akeneo plugin
item.description: FEATURE STATE: Middleware 0.1 [alpha] Configuration format Building an extractor YAML satellite: pipeline: steps: - akeneo: enterprise: false extractor: type: productModel method: all search: - { field: enabled, operator: '=', value: true } - { field: completeness, operator: '>', value: 70, scope: ecommerce } - { field: completeness, operator: '<', value: 85, scope: ecommerce } - { field: categories, operator: IN, value: winter_collection } - { field: family, operator: IN, value: [camcorders, digital_cameras] } logger: type: 'stderr' client: api_url: 'https://demo.
